text: The Story of Wipro: From Vegetable Oil to Global Tech Giant
image_desc: Vintage Wipro logo clipart, old-fashioned oil press clipart

text: In 1945, Mohamed Premji founded Western India Vegetable Products (Wipro), a humble vegetable oil manufacturing company in Amalner, India.
image_desc: 1940s India street scene clipart, oil refinery clipart (simple)

text: The company faced many challenges in its early years, navigating post-independence India's economic landscape.
image_desc: Post-independence India clipart, businessman struggling clipart

text: Under Azim Premji's leadership, starting in the 1970s, Wipro transitioned from vegetable oil to computing and IT services.
image_desc: Azim Premji young clipart, early computer clipart

text: This bold move proved incredibly successful. Wipro embraced emerging technologies and became a pioneer in the Indian IT industry.
image_desc: 1980s computer technology clipart, upward graph clipart

text: Through innovation and a commitment to excellence, Wipro expanded globally, becoming a leading provider of IT consulting, technology, and outsourcing services.
image_desc: Global network clipart, diverse group of people working on computers clipart

text: Wipro's journey is a testament to adaptability, vision, and a dedication to quality.  It's a story of transformation and enduring success.
image_desc: Modern Wipro logo clipart, rising sun clipart

text: From humble beginnings in the vegetable oil industry, Wipro has blossomed into a global technology giant, inspiring generations of entrepreneurs and innovators.
image_desc: Wipro building clipart, success celebration clipart
